text: is a Japanese franchise of different media. It was originally published as a manga series, written and illustrated by Masamune Shirow. It told the story of a fictional counter-cyberterrorist organisation. It has been made into a series of anime television series and movies, and a series of video games. ==Other websites== *Official site of Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex (television series) Category:Anime Category:Manga
title: Ghost in the Shell
